lines: 1. Ntshovelo Wa Misava Wu Kusuhi, Hosi Vitana Vatshoveri Vaku;
Hinkwako-nkwako Koro Yi Vupfile, Se Yi Lulamele Ku Tshoveriwa.
2. Mixo Lowuya Wu Taka Wa Ntsako, Wa Karhi Wa Tshinela Hi Malembe;
Koro Yi Funengeteke Hi Swivi, A Yi Hatle Yi Hlengeletiwa.
3. I Swinene Ku Tirha Hi Rirhandzu, Xinambyana Lexi Pfaka Matilwen;
I Rirhandzu Leri Hi Yimelaka, Ku Tinyiketen Ko Hlamarisa.
